responseText: I'm just a schoolgirl, really. Full of ideas, but afraid to go out and chase them myself! Could you imagine me scrambling to the top of that great Heartwood out in the harbor? Oh, but the branches are so brittle, so old. I've stood on the walls of the fort, here, and watched them snap and tumble in the wind. What I wouldn't do for a dozen or so of those fallen snags to study. Perhaps they retain some glimmer of their fabled magics.
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Carole_4_Response
